To borrow crypto, please transfer assets to your C2C Margin Account.
Amount entered exceeds the available credits. Please re-enter the amount.
Amount entered is smaller that {{0}} the minimum limits of single loan. Please re-enter the amount.

\'Term\' refers to the borrowing period for a single C2C Margin product. If you don\'t have sufficient balance to repay your loan by the end of the borrowing period, forced liquidation will be triggered.
C2C Margin is temporarily not available, please try again later.
There may be a delay in repaying the borrowed tokens. Please review results after submission.
Your repayment request has been received. Please do not resubmit it.
Rate= Rate after renewal+ Previous Rate

In a C2C loan order, borrowed assets need to be repaid before the expire date. If the loan is due and not repaid, the system will automatically return the token from its balance. Forced transaction will be triggered automatically to repay the debt when the balance is insufficient by the repayment date.
In C2C margin account, the repayment amount due includes outstanding margin loans in this order + all outstanding interest.

After receiving the repayment, the original principal will be automatically placed on a new loan order and to be reissued. The interest rate on the order will be the same as the original interest rate on the order. If it is the market rate, it will be recalculated according to the market rule.

In a C2C loan order, borrowed assets need to be repaid before the expire date. If the loan is due and not repaid, the system will automatically return the token from its balance. Forced transaction will be triggered automatically to repay the debt when the balance is insufficient by the repayment date.
An automatic renewal is conducted from the best interest rate (may be different from the current rate)on the market.
Please proceed to access this function via PC.
The simple way to deposit and earn
The product you selected is only open to new registered users, you can try other products.

Due to local laws and regulations, \"Savings\" temporarily does not provide services to users from the following countries and regions: the Chinese mainland, Hong Kong, Japan, Singapore, the United States, Germany, and the United Kingdom. You can check the country or region of ID authentication on the User Center page.
Purchasing savings product needs to update your identity authentication level, please complete identity verification first.
At {{0}}(GMT+8) every day, the system will use all the balance in your exchange account that can be transferred to purchase flexible products automatically.
The interest is calculated on the daily basis of the available balances of flexible savings and is issued by taking down to 8 decimal places.
The interest of the promotion product you subscribed will start to be accrued from tomorrow (GTM+8)
The interest of the promotion product you subscribed will start to be accrued from tomorrow (GTM+8)
The interest of the promotion product you subscribed will start to be accrued from tomorrow (GTM+8)

The earning of all remained principal and interest for the corresponding flexible savings shall be accrued from the date of subscription T+1. The subscription amount will be subject to your current subscription limit. The subscription will not be available once the product is taken off after the expiry date.

You can transfer your locked savings assets to flexible savings (min 1 Lot) to make an early redemption.

When the latest price of {{1}} reaches {{2}} at {{0}}, your {{3}} futures account\'s equity will be {{4}}, adjustment coefficient {{5}}, margin rate ≤0, and forced liquidation will be triggered. Since you hold long and short positions at the same time, {{8}} contracts of the {{6}} position will be liquidated at the price of {{7}}, leaving net positions.

When the latest price of {{1}} reaches {{2}} at {{0}}, your {{3}} contract account\'s equity will be {{4}}, adjustment coefficient {{5}}, margin rate ≤0, and forced selling will be triggered. {{8}} contracts of the {{6}} position will be taken over by the system at the price of {{7}}, with {{9}} contracts left. But this price will not be shown on the Chart.

When the latest price of {{1}} reaches {{2}} at {{0}}, your {{3}} contract account\'s equity will be {{4}}, adjustment coefficient {{5}}, margin rate ≤0, and forced liquidation will be triggered. The {{6}} position is taken over by the system at the price of {{7}}. But this price will not be shown on the Chart.

When the latest price of {{1}} reaches {{2}} at {{0}}, your {{3}} contract account\'s equity will be {{4}}, adjustment coefficient {{5}}, margin rate ≤0, and forced selling will be triggered. {{8}} liquidation orders of the {{6}} position were placed by the system at the price of {{7}}, with {{9}} triggered.

USDT Swaps in the cross margin account share the same amount of the USDT margin. Contracts vary in tiered margin, available margin, and estimated liquidation price.
This service is only available on the Huobi website {{0}}.

After enabling this function, you'll be entitled to discounts for transactions and coin loans. HT in your exchange account, if any, will be used first to deduct fees and coin interest. 

When the amount of HT available is not enough to cover fees and interest, your quote currency will be deducted automatically according to the current tiered fee rates and coin interest rates by default. (For example, a user needs to pay 200 USDT worth of HT for selling an amount of BTC/USDT, while he/she only has 180 USDT worth of HT available in the exchange account. In this case, the system will deduct no HT but 200 USDT based on the default tiered fee rates.) 

The parent account and sub-account must use the same transaction rate and interest rate. 

Note: Discounts are determined by the level of your fee rate on the day, rather than the available HT in your exchange account.

· After enabling this function, you\'ll be entitled to discounts for transactions and coin loans. Point Cards in your exchange account, if any, will be used first to deduct fees and coin interest.;\n· When you run out of points, you need to disable this function manually to switch to the tiered fee system.
Are you sure you don\'t want fee discounts?
After the function being disabled, default tiered fee rates and interest rates will be applied to your transactions and coin loans.
Enable HT Payment and enjoy new rates 6 hrs after your HT purchase.
Failed. You have 0 point cards available in your account.

Due to a system upgrade, the total realized P/L has been shown as P/L starting from 00:00, January 30, 2021 (GMT+8), regardless of settlement. \n\nTo check out historical P/L data, please go to History - Executed - Details - Closing P/L.

Due to a system upgrade, the total realized P/L has been shown as P/L starting from 00:00, January 30, 2021 (GMT+8), regardless of settlement. 
How to calculate P/L: 
(1) Coin-Margined: 
P/L (Long) = (1/Open Avg - 1/Close Avg) * Face Value Per Contract * Contract Size
P/L (Short) = (1/Close Avg - 1/Open Avg) * Face Value Per Contract * Contract Size 
(2) USDT-Margined: 
P/L (Long) = (Close Avg - Open Avg) * Face Value Per Contract * Contract Size
P/L (Short) = (1/Open Avg - 1/Close Avg) * Face Value Per Contract * Contract Size


To view historical P/L data, please go to History - Executed - Details - Closing P/L.

Closing P/L refers to the P/L after the last settlement, excluding previously settled P/L. 
How to calculate P/L: 
(1) Coin-Margined: 
P/L (Long) = (1/Position Price - 1/Close Avg) * Face Value Per Contract * Contract Size
P/L (Short) = (1/Close Avg - 1/Position Price) * Face Value Per Contract * Contract Size 
(2) USDT-Margined: 
P/L (Long) = (Close Avg - Position Price) * Face Value Per Contract * Contract Size
P/L (Short) = (Position Price - Close Avg) * Face Value Per Contract * Contract Size

How do you like our service
• Point Cards can be used immediately after purchase. They are non-transferable and will expire in {{0}}.
• Point Cards can be used to pay spot and margin trading fees, loan interest rates, and Maker fees.
• Your trading fee will be estimated in USDT and paid with Point Cards at a ratio of 1:1 (1 Point = 1 USDT). Those nearing expiration are rotated for first-use.
• If you do not buy Points Cards with USDT, your trading fee will depend on the 1-minute market price of your selected coin.
Orders will be canceled if not paid.
Enjoy Lower Fees With Point Cards

The times that the bot makes a profit from buying the dip and selling at the top.
Profits or losses made from buying the dip and selling at the top, minus commission fees.
This order has been closed manually.
This order has been closed by TP.
This order has been closed by SL.
This bot has been closed. No order history.

1. Investment: 
The estimated value of the assets you invest when setting up a bot. If your investment involves two different coins, your assets will be estimated into the quote coin. 

2. Total PNL: 
The balance under the current bot minus the investment

3. Unrealized PNL: 
The current balance, excluding the Grid PNL, minus the investment

4. Grid PNL: 
Profits or losses made by the current grid trading bot.
After you close the bot, open orders of grid trading will be canceled and your balance in the Quant Account will be transferred to the Exchange Account.
Sell {{0}} at the best available price. (A price spread may occur due to the market volatility.)
Grid trading is not available for this pair.

1. Profit Margin Per Grid: 
The estimated profit per grid within the price range, minus commission fees. 

2. Arbitrage Trading: 
The times that the bot makes a profit from buying the dip and selling at the top.
Profits or losses made from buying the dip and selling at the top, minus commission fees.

1. If you withdraw crypto to Ponzi scheme and other untrusted platforms, your assets will not be withdrawn from the platform any more.
2. You may suffer loss of assets if you are lured to withdraw for arbitrage, airdrop and other ways of investment.
3. Users could be held accountable by justice if they are entrusted or enticed by others to assist buying and withdrawing assets.

1. Once enabling, you can only withdraw to addresses in the whitelist; \n2. After adding addresses to the whitelist, you need to wait a certain period of time for the platform to activate them; \n 3. Disabling whitelist service or shortening pending time need to be reviewed by the platform administrator;
Before new pending time updates, the newly added addresses and those waiting to be activated will still follow the old rule.
Addresses have been added to the whitelist, waiting to be activated.
